segments.text: Hello , take a seat please . Let's get straight to the point . This is our contract . Please read it carefully before signing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since we have reached an agreement on all terms , there shouldn't be any problems for the contract .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May we once more remind you that the contract should be canceled by one month notice .
segments.speaker: S1
